PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08422018-06-21,  DFO,  ,  , 
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Marine Mammal Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MARINE MAMMAL REGULATIONS in order to reduce the disturbance caused to marine mammals by whale watching activities, by providing for rules that are mandatory, enforceable, uniformly applicable, and easy to communicate. The amendments provide a regulatory framework that can be varied and adjusted over time to maintain an appropriate balance between managing disturbance to marine mammals and allowing public access to whale watching.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0126 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
